mapper.sql: c.id as id, c.name as name, c.category as category, c.type as type, c.status as status, c.publish_unit as publishUnit, c.publish_date as publishDate, c.implement_date as implementDate, c.summary as summary, c.create_id as createId, c.create_time as createTime, c.update_id as updateId, c.update_time as updateTime, c.usable as usable
mapper.select: select , s.name as categoryName, d.name as typeName, t.name as publishUnitName, a.name as statusName from tb_criterion c left join tb_system_data s on s.code = c.category left join tb_system_data d on d.code = c.type left join tb_system_data t on t.code = c.publish_unit left join tb_system_data a on a.code = c.status where c.usable = 1 and c.id = #{id}
